original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 323.50/325.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 323.50/325.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was closed at 15.90/95 percent after opening at 15.90/95 percent on Tuesday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 closed at 15.10/20 percent unchanged from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed steady at 13.25/50 percent after opening at 13.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July19/2023)
